Text: Then you are doing it wrong, just did on a fresh install: http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/4026/screenshot20120713at952.png
Can confirm working like a charm. I seemed to have updated my already installed istat without even having to enter any included serial, lol. And yes it's registered and updated, double-checked.
I can also confirm, my existing registration held and this version works like a charm. I'm ready for Mountain Lion!
